snippet: An investment group that includes the Hall of Famer Wade Boggs last week completed its oft-delayed purchase of the farm in Dyersville, Iowa, where “Field of Dreams” was filmed.
lead_paragraph: An investment group that includes the Hall of Famer Wade Boggs last week completed its oft-delayed purchase of the farm in Dyersville, Iowa, where “Field of Dreams” was filmed.

headline.main: Group Including Wade Boggs Buys ‘Field of Dreams’ Farm
headline.print_headline: Boggs Group Buys ‘Field of Dreams’ Farm
